Title: Episode 2
Plot:
It's another episode from Network Wiggles.  The opening song is "Music with Murray".  In the News, Dorothy rides with some kids on a ferryboat.  Captain Feathersword predicts it's raining cats and dogs, and the mascots play a game of Pentagne (lawn bowling).  In Anthony's Workshop, the children make paper butterflies.

Song List:
"Music with Murray"
"Rolling down the sand hills / 
Running up the sand hills"
"C'est Wags, C'est Bon"
"Dressing up with style"
"Testing 1, 2, 3"
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
